title: Green Synthesis of Thioamide Derivatives in Environmentally Benign Deep Eutectic Solvent (DES)
content:

A mild, direct, simple, and highly efficient green protocol is described for synthesizing thioamides. A wide variety of thioamides are obtained in good-to-excellent yields by the reaction of readily available...
